Janicza Michelle Bravo Ford (/dʒəˈnɪksə/; amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 25, nke afọ 1981) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Amerịka, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri. Ihe nkiri ya gụnyere Gregory Go Boom, onye mmeri nke ihe nkiri mkpirikpi na Sundance Film Festival, Lemon, nke ya na Brett Gelman dere, na Zola, nke ya ne onye edemede egwuregwu Jeremy O

A mụrụ Bravo na New York City, nwa nwanyị nke Ana María Ford na Rafael Ángel Landers. Nne na nna ya, ndị bụ ndị na-akwa ákwà, si Colón, Panama. Nne ya debanyere aha na ndị agha US mgbe Bravo bụ nwa ọhụrụ. Site n'oge ọ dị ọnwa atọ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ tolitere n'etiti Colón na ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha na Panama City, Panama, ruo mgbe ezinụlọ ya laghachiri na United States. Ọ nọrọ oge na-agagharị na-aga n'etiti United States na Panama n'oge ọ bụ nwata. Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Crown Heights, Brooklyn.
Bravo gara Playwrights Horizons Theater School nke Mahadum New York Tisch School of the Arts, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ntụziaka na imepụta ihe nkiri, nke gụnyere ejiji na imepụta.

Ọtụtụ afọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, ọ kwagara Los Angeles, rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ejiji ma mepụta obere ihe nkiri tupu onye na-ese ihe nkiri bịakwutere ya nke nyere aka na ime ihe nkiri.
Bravo na-asụ Spanish nke ọma ma bụrụkwa Latina. Bravo bụ onye Juu.

N'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2015, Bravo lụrụ enyi ya nwoke ogologo oge, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Brett Gelman.  Gelman na Bravo zutere na New York City mgbe ha na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi New York Lotto. N'afọ 2016, ha biri na Los Angeles. Ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2018.
